text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, Trainer-san! Spread your legs wider! 
And then move your back liiiiiiike this!
choice_data_list: Even if you say……ow ow ow!!!!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa, that was fun～♪ 
Trainer-san, you were making so many funny faces!
choice_data_list: I didn't think we'd be doing Yoga

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Geez～, if you're like that, we won't be able to 
do everything planned, you know? Next is piano! 
And after that are calligraphy and English!

Today, I was invited by Vivlos to tag along with her. 
If you were to ask why, then――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ――About Onee-chan? Why do you want to ask me about her?
choice_data_list: Before scouting, I want to know more

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Ehh～～ so you wanna know that badly, huh? 
Let's see～ just what should I do♪～?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Then, Trainer-san～ 
You should listen to everything I say! Okay♪?

Even if only a little, I wanted to know more about 
Verxina and find out why she was so flustered. For 
some reason, I thought that was incredibly important.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, c'mon, you want to know more about Onee-chan right!? 
Then you need to come with me! Let's go, let's go～!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Last up is Tea lessons! This is～, 
something special I'll teach you♪ I learned right from Onee-chan!

I breathe a sigh of relief at the word 『Last』. It was a long day, 
filled with exercise, music, and linguistic learning.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
So～. How was it? 
Do you understand Onee-chan a little better now?

I had certainly experienced a lot today. 
But I don't think we talked about Verxina at all――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
No way, you mean you didn't realize it at all!? 
Everywhere we went to today is something that Onee-chan has learned!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan is super kind, you know.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I said I wanted to try 
something, she'd always do it with me――

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text:
You want to learn piano? 
――Okay, I'll learn with you.

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Yoga? Fufuu, because of you, 
I get to challenge so many different things.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
And you see, even if I got bored and stopped, 
Onee-chan would still continue on……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Saying that once she started, she wanted to do it perfectly. 
And then, after she continued on like that――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
If I ever wanted to do something again, she continued on so she 
could teach me. Even though it was really hard to continue on.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
That's the kind of Onee-chan that I know. 
Serious, hard-working and――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: And kinder than anyone!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Eh…………Nee-san, is it……?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
She's completely different from……me. 
Elegant, and refined……

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Perfect in anything she does, 
never cutting corners…… That's why――

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
No, sorry. 
That's why……Well, she must――

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
――See me as someone pitiable……then. 
That's just how much she worries about me……

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Understand, Cheval? 
No matter how fast you want to be, you can't rush it.

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text:
So you don't get injured, you need to properly stretch. 
……C'mon, Nee-san will show you how.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
To avoid injuries, to not push myself too hard…… 
Always, Nee-san worries about me……

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
……I do get it though. 
That Nee-san is always thinking about me.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
That's why, someday I want to prove it…… 
She doesn't have to worry about me. That――I'll be fine.

In the end, what I learned from her younger sisters was 
just how much Verxina cared about them as an older sister.

The more I learn about her personality, the more it seems 
like it doesn't match with her goal of aiming for the 『Peak』……

The first time that I saw Verxina, I couldn't take my 
eyes off her as she steadfastly aimed for greater heights.

『Don't ever look away』 
Maybe that feeling was more like a prayer from her than a demand.
But, who was that prayer for――

Just what was it that drove her to aim for the 『Peak』? 
I think I finally had an idea of what that truly was.
